title: Massive frame lag
body: So this patch has given me Massive frame drop when moving to things, ususally i sit at around 120 fps, btu when i move over anythign the frames drop to about 4, its only this patch but playuing jhinn, it gett very difficul to do anything.

replies.body: Maybe something corrupted during your patch, I haven't seen similar issues. Maybe clicking repair in the launcher might help?
